website_summaries.verdict: Ergonomic design and wide mopping area. Reusable pads with a fast-change Velcro attachments. Great for big homes.
pros: Wide, but easy to push and pivot
Reusable, washable pads with Velcro attachments for easy changes
cons: Velcro pad attachment loosens or falls off after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: This Rubbermaid Commercial Hygen product ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: My floor guy spent the entire day professionally cleaning my kitchen tile floor. After, he recommended I maintain it by using this Rubbermaid Commercial Hygen along with boiling hot water (with or without a tablespoon of white vinegar), poured carefully onto the tile. I mop the tile with this every two weeks and so far it works. Afterwards, I easily remove the cover from the mop and throw it in the wash machine and let it air dry. I'm very satisfied with the product. It's easy to use and does the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Best mop yet!
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this quick connect frame. I think this is the best mop I've ever had. I love how quick you can exchange the cloths on it. I like the way it swivels. It goes behind and around the toilet great. It goes under furniture because it lays flat and gets right up to the corners. I'm very pleased with this mop purchase. I got the Rubbermaid Commercial Quick-Connect Straight Extension Handle, Yellow (FGQ75500YL00) to go with it and it fits perfect. I'm using these mop pads: 18" Microfiber Wet and Dry Mop Pads Fit 15 to 18 Inch Bona or Libman Hook Washable Replacement Refills for Floor (6-Pack with 1 Plastic Clean Scraper)
customer_reviews.author: Lyvwell

customer_reviews.title: My goto flat mop head
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our cleaning business and have transitioned almost fully to flat mops over the old mop and bucket method. These heads work great with a smooth swivel action and loop and hoop strips are plenty strong enough to hold the mop heads in place. TIPS: Take care when removing the mop head, had one head where the loop and hook strip came off with the mop head making it unusable. That why I only gave 4 stars and not 5. Make sure to use a handle long enough to make it comfortable for the operator. I like the yellow extension handles 48" - 72". Make sure the handle has the correct connection for these heads.
customer_reviews.author: XpectClean

customer_reviews.title: I usually spray the floor (wood floors) lightly with water or diluted cleaner and this works great. Last floor pad mop I'll have to buy
customer_reviews.text: I was recently in the hospital and they used this to do the floors and I have been looking for something that was easier to use then what I have. The big plus is that I can put the microfiber pad on the floor and don't have to bend over or pick it up to put it on and it stays in place when cleaning. I usually spray the floor (wood floors) lightly with water or diluted cleaner and this works great. Last floor pad mop I'll have to buy. Also got the dust mop that goes with it and it works great. Highly recommend. No wonder hospitals use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carsok

customer_reviews.title: If you can love a mop without being crazy
customer_reviews.text: If you can love a mop without being crazy, then I love this. This can be used with both a drop mop an wet mop, both of which attach securing with velcro. The mop can be flattened to fit behind or under just about anything. DO NOT BOTHER BUYING THE NON-COMMERCIAL version in stores that comes with the attached cleanser. These always break, and the bottle limits mobility. Just take a squirt bottle with you and you are good to go. I almost enjoy cleaning with this, that's how much of a difference it makes to work with the right tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chava1997

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard floor cleanup!!
customer_reviews.text: My dad was in the hospital and the cleaning staff was using these. Got one and some of the Hygen washable pads and this works AMAZING for cleaning up household spills and accidents from my elderly corgi. This handle is industrial, so it is very stout, which is a sharp contrast to the flimsy, crappy Swiffer-type light mops I have used in the past. The head is perfect for getting into tight corners and up against baseboards. Length is adjustable, which is great because I am tall, and at maximum length, it gives you leverage to clean up tough spills on tile, laminate, or wood. Also works great dry to get pet hair cleaned up in a flash.
customer_reviews.author: C-Dub

customer_reviews.title: No handle with this product
customer_reviews.text: This does not come with a handle. They talk about a telescoping handle to reach hard to reach places but it doesn’t come with that handle. Go figure
customer_reviews.author: Marcus W

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product. Just please come with some kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have brought too many in the past year. The strips that hold the mop pad in place starts to come off even in a short time of using it. Other than that, it's a great product. Just please come with some kind of way for the pads to be able to snap on the ends so the this product can last longer. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Mother of banshee Indian boys- this is the mop!
customer_reviews.text: Mother of four wild and dirty boys. I got the Rubbermaid NON extendable pole (which is fabulous and sturdy!) and the microfiber pads. I slap those on and wipe away at my dirty hardwood floors when the banshee Indians come in and boy it leaves a good clean sparkle to my floor. I don’t have time for silliness and sub par quality mops. This does the job quicker than a steam mop, and the spin mop. Easy peasy and it ain’t too bad if more mud comes in cause my mop is simple, fast, and sturdy. Will not be looking for a different type of mop cause I finally found the best of the best
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great mop system
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these mops. It was hard to find exactly the correct model to match the handle and fabric mop piece. This head piece seems really sturdy and flexes into tight spaces. The terry-cloth like Velcro mop fabric allows you to wash right up to the baseboards or cabinet bases. I throw the fabric part in the washing machine, after rinsing it in the sink to get any grit off. Have had the first one for years.
customer_reviews.author: DAP

customer_reviews.title: Freaking plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is meant for mild commercial use and i used it for a cleaning bizz time to time. When i first got it, it worked well and was quite maneuverable. One thing i noticed was the pin that connected the head to the handle was plastic and after some use. It broke. Im sure one of the anchores on the head being crooked did not help as you can see in the photo, but this is what happens when everything is made of plastic including hinges. It needs to be made of medal, to bad because it worked great and the handle is fine.
customer_reviews.author: YesIAM

customer_reviews.title: Very good mop head. Semi versatile
customer_reviews.text: I like that the head of this mop is detachable. It is well made and durable. But I do wish it came as a set with the mop head, handle, and pads. I would also love to see a little bit more maneuverability in the head, like a ball that rotated so it can go on a 360 degree turn. I use this to walls as well and that would make it a lot easier. Otherwise I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Squire Allen Boice

customer_reviews.title: Love it, get the set
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I switched to this mop. It's very easy to use, very high quality, and a great bargain. It makes mopping a thousand times easier. I bought the handle, head, and mop pads together as the "frequently purchased together" set. Some people have stated that the 20(ish) inch mop pads in that set are too long for the 17 inch head, but that is not true. The few extra inches makes it possible to reach your pad under very low-clearance furniture, appliances (like the oven) and doors without having to move or open anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Oh! I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Oh!! I love this. It’s been a long time with my old one (different model) same length but this one is not nearly as wide. It fits everywhere, past nightstands and behind bed frames!!! I love the ease of taking off and putting on the pole. Such a breeze to use in my house cleaning service. It’s the simple things😊.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a Swiffer Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these when I got new solid flooring throughout the house. This is light years ahead of a Swiffer Sweeper and it is much wider. I like the dust mop more than the wet pad, but I do use the wet pad once in a while when I don't feel like using a mop. The wet pad is great when the dog drinks and dribbles water all over. I got tired of going up and down the stairs to get this so I purchased a second one. I should have done this in the first place since I had two vacuums when I had carpet, and these are much cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Owner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed its sold separately and if I would have known ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with a handle so I currently can't use it.. After spending 15 on this I'm not so sure I want to spend another 17 on a handle .. Disappointed its sold separately and if I would have known that I wouldn't have wasted money buying this !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!!!!!!!!! Does NOT come with the pole, just the frame!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Speeds up cleaning on large surfaces and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to use these commercially, and when I moved into a home with a large amount of tile and wood flooring I knew I had to get one again. I love this model and highly recommend it especially if you’re looking for a more sanitary option using the washable pads. Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Ksakievich

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop. Ive been using it for years along with thw rubbermaid extension pole. Those 2 together make mopping a breeze. I wish i came with atleast one actual mop pad but no complaints other than that.
customer_reviews.author: q

customer_reviews.title: 4 Years & Still Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the swivel head. Its really easy to get in tight places like around the fridge or under the couch. Useful for wet and dry mopping. Unlike a Swiffer, you can use your own cleaner and reusable mop bonnets.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: This is the just the head or frame and does not include pole
customer_reviews.text: Love the Rubbermaid head and pole (sold separately). My Bona pole kept breaking so I replaced it with the Rubbermaid products and the set is much sturdier. Bona pads just fit it and cleaning is much faster because I'm not stopping to tightening up pole.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean walls in house with valted ceilings saw one being used in hospital had to get one. We have a child that is sick so works great to bleach walls every couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: size change
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as 3.5" wide but I measured my last 2 and they are only 3" wide, this is a little too narrow. I thought I had ordered the wrong on so I gave the first one away and ordered another on that stated it was 3.5 wide. This one is only 3" wide also. You need to fix the measurement so others don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J.

customer_reviews.title: ... and as far as I'm concerned it is the best mop a person could own
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mop before when I worked in a hospital and as far as I'm concerned it is the best mop a person could own..the blue pads can be washed in the washer and dried in drier and the handle and frame are very light and easily connect together and disconnect of needed. The frame can reach under the stove and under the refrigerator easily and able to slide into tight area's if needed. If you need to wash the walls in your home it's the fastest and easiest way to do it instead of using a rag and your hand....great product would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with a Rubbermaid I bought at the homedepot. Mine broke and the bottom was the problem. They no longer sell these at homedepot, and I couldn’t find any cheap or reasonably priced anywhere. So I bought this and my boyfriend drilled holes in it and we stuck a nut and built in it and it works perfect! I’m super happy this makes mopping a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey and Velcro defect
customer_reviews.text: I do house cleaning and after I used it 3 times, one of the Velcro strips started to peel off.. After the 5 clean, I had to pull it off.., I think it's a bit pricey, I thought it came with the pole as well, but when I opened my package I realized it was just the mop plate.. Also I've checked Home Depot and lowes and I can not find the pole to go with it.. I bought one other mop at Home Depot a while back for about $20 and I've never had a problem with it..
customer_reviews.author: Alma Flores

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have saved so much money by switching to this mop. I bought the handle, head, and pads. it's expensive but paid for it in the end. The pads rinse out very well. The soak up a lot of water and dirt and hair!!!!! I have 2 dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruqueline

customer_reviews.title: Pole sold separately
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you also order a pole to go with it. Product is excellent and came just as it is pictured, pole sold separately. We have been using these microfiber systems for years and my people love the content Velcro pads for sweeping and mopping.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: I discovered this wonderful product working as a house keeper in a hospital
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this wonderful product working as a house keeper in a hospital. I use it with 3M 55654 Easy Trap Duster, 8" x 6" x 125'. It works like you wouldn't believe! The duster sheets are dry and stick to the Velcro on the head shown here. You just lay the sheet on the floor and press the head against it and your ready to go. It doesn't come off until you pull it off. IT PICKS UP EVERYTHING!!! And since it's dry it will last much longer than wet sheets. I'll use the same sheets all day! Amazing product! you wont go wrong with this!!!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Better than paying for swiffers
customer_reviews.text: I ditched the swiffer for this and I am not looking back! Much more economical and environmentally friendly. I use this on my wood floors and linoleum and it works fabulously. If the floors are dirty you will have to wipe up extra dirt at the end, but this is no different than the swiffer. I found it swivels very nicely and is dynamite with oil soap. The pads stay secured to the head, and in that respect I think it may be better than the swiffer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, low profile, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight, but sturdy enough to do some serious scrubbing. The angled corners make it easy to get into places other mops cannot. Good size to cover a lot of area. Also, it is very low profile so fits under furniture and even doors. The Velcro-like attachment seems quite sturdy and (hopefully) not likely to peel off. The mop and duster attachments securely adhere but are easy to remove using a peeling motion. Like others have suggested, just place the damp mop or duster on the floor, set the mop head on top and you are ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Striker

customer_reviews.title: ... always the drudge husband job with the grocery store crappy junk, it was a nasty mess and who ...
customer_reviews.text: Mopping was always the drudge husband job with the grocery store crappy junk, it was a nasty mess and who can really get those sponges clean. This thing with a Velcro removable and washable pad can eat up floor at 18" wide and swivel to get into those narrow spaces around the toilet. I'm done in less than half the time and the floor is cleaner than ever....and the wife if happier.
customer_reviews.author: W. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for navigating around pictures and the like while doing ...
customer_reviews.text: I find this piece to be essential in conjunction with the new quick-connect mopping system. The size is perfect for navigating around pictures and the like while doing walls and is ideal for bathtubs. Coincidentally also pretty much the exact size of a Swiffer wet-jet pad sooooo.......yeah. I use the non-disposable types of which the chamois-cloth type are perfect for doing glass and mirrors, and the thicker cloth pads for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S.

customer_reviews.title: You only get the mop head.....no pole
customer_reviews.text: Fun fact- the description is very unclear. Yes it says frame, but what exactly is that part of a mop? The description even goes into detail of extending up to 10 feet. “Well”, I thought to myself, “it must also come with a handle, but why would a mop be sold without a handle?” “And why would it be $20 for just the mop head?”.... well friends, I’m here to tell you it is just the head and does not come with the correct pole. $20 later I am still on my hands and knees mopping my floor...now I’m more upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Allen

customer_reviews.title: My cleaning lady recommended
customer_reviews.text: My cleaning lady recommended this and boy howdy are we happy. This is so so soooo much easier to use than any other mop. Cleaning the hardwood and cement floors is fast and easy now.
customer_reviews.author: Kris K.

customer_reviews.title: Every part priced separately
customer_reviews.text: When I was viewing the product online to purchase, it was shown as a mop unit. however each piece is sold as a separate unit therefore the extension rod ranges from $20 approximately $94.00! so I’m returning it because the marketing and the price was not as it appeared. Now it appears the marketing has been corrected, but the selling of the rod as a pricey separate piece is reason to pass on this
customer_reviews.author: johnnyv

customer_reviews.title: Shipped without black connector piece
customer_reviews.text: I'd really like to tell you how great this mop is but it was shipped out without the connector piece.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very strong handle that is made well.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders. We have a rotwiler hair everywere year round. Never could get all the hair are dirt up with sweeping and moping. With the micro pads and this nice handle The glides around corners and slim enough to get hard to reach area. Floors look great and can walk and not have dirt are hair stuck to feet. Will never use broom are mop again. Would most definitely recommend. Handle is sturdy and made very well:-)
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than plastic mop heads
customer_reviews.text: This is the best microfiber mop I've ever had. The aluminum head is very solid, so you're cleaning with the entire surface area, rather than just the middle where the handle is attached (which is what I experienced with previous plastic-head types of microfiber mops). I use it to clean my hardwood floor, and it works well. I love that the microfiber attachments are so easy to attach - just slap on with velcro. As mentioned in other reviews, this is the head only so be sure to purchase compatible handle and microfiber attachments.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieC in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget pads and a shaft!
customer_reviews.text: Warning: this is just the head, no shaft. You also need mop pads, such as. It works very well for hands and knees work as well, where it makes you feel like the Karate Kid waxing on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Lind

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality. Make sure you get the correct handle. It is confusing. Amazon recommended the wrong handle.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend system!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome system!! Highly recommend buying straight adjustable pole.. this system is MUCH more stable than store bought poles. I’m so glad I purchased!! I use frequent for business and it’s so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Ehnnies

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Rubbermaid mop system for years, and they make cleaning hard surfaces very easy. My friend recently moved into town and needed a mopping system for his hard surfaces. I immediately ordered these as a housewarming present. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryndon Preston

customer_reviews.title: Good system for wood flooring
customer_reviews.text: I hate cleaning house, but this mop makes it easier. New house has a lot of wood flooring which I had not ever dealt with. I bought the straight handle and the blue Velcro pads. I spray the floor with Bona cleaner, mop the area, then dry with an old towel. We’ve been in the house 9 months and the floor still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: MamariaP

customer_reviews.title: Can’t compete against Rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: Liked the ease and use of this product. Very lightweight and sturdy. It’s what you’d expect from Rubbermaid products. Tried and tested.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: All about this Base - no worries.
customer_reviews.text: Velcro strips hang on tight to the available mop heads with ease. I like cleaning now. You'll need the same brand of handle to attach to this base. Love the plastic bumpers on the ends as they prevent scratches if you accidentally bang the wall. Get some brand related mop heads and you re on your way to a better experience than store brought mop products.
customer_reviews.author: L. Evans

customer_reviews.title: These are nice for a large hard floor surface mopping
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for a large hard floor surface mopping. My wife can't seem to figure out how to use them to get off crusty stuck on things, but they work for me and they make it really easy to mop the whole house--far faster and easier than a regular mop. I coupled mine with a "3 Pack 18" Microfiber Wet Mop Refill Pads..."
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: They came in a day after the mops. Very good product. These are replacements for two very old heads. We own our own cleaning company and only use these for mopping.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Keep an eye out. My house cleaners still them. Best mom handle ever.
customer_reviews.author: robertcault

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, I guess...
customer_reviews.text: Bought with 58" handle, works okay...but haven't figured out why edges are angled (cloth mops that you attach are not angled) so they don't sit perfectly on the head (they also are much bigger in size)...
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Made with cheap plastic (pivot joint) and velcro does not stick!
customer_reviews.text: Easily breaks at the yellow and black pivoting joint. Also the velcro stripping easily comes off after a few times taking the micro fiber cloth off. I had to re-glue it often. I notice Rubbermaid has gotten cheap with their plastic pieces. It could be a systematically with Rubbermaid to make certain areas on their product to break easily so that customers keep having to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: H.D

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these mops. I use them at my job in a hospital to not only mop, but wash walls, ceilings, and baseboards. Just had to have one for home. The head pivots so easily making cleaning that much simpler. Don't forget to buy the handle. Not a complete set
customer_reviews.author: kjb9585

customer_reviews.title: Good mop head, does NOT include mop handle
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have paid better attention to the dimensions because, while this is a great mop head, it does not include the mop handle which requires the quick connect system (regular handles don't work). So, if you want to use this on arrival, make sure you order the mop handle as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I have ever had!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the total Rubbermaid Commercial mop system now. I use it with a squirt bottle of cleaner/wax. It is a very quick way to clean and shine my wood floors!!! I saw this system being used in a hospital when my husband was in there and came home and found the complete system on Amazon. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: BTH

customer_reviews.title: DITCH your Swiffer ASAP.  This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Super easy to use. Multiple ‘mop’ heads available for purchase which are washable! A better product and nothing goes in the landfill!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. I use these at work. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works sometimes good in light duty’s when try in hard works no good
customer_reviews.author: xxxxxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, excellent product, we use it everywhere in the hospital so I went out and bought one.
customer_reviews.text: this is a light weight, clean environmentally friendly, streamline product to mop your floor. It recycles the same mop pad, into the laundry for cleaning, and resticks well to the mop head. Best darn mop I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: cpangaea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Use it every week and it has helped so much with keeping the floors clean. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to buy the stick
customer_reviews.text: I wish the description for this product was clearer. It said mop frame-which I thought was the whole mop. Apparently it was ONLY the mop head and I had to wait two more days before I could clean for the stick to arrive once I realized I had to order it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia RC

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Wet/Dry Mop Head
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of using this type of mop. Having difficulty locating wet or dry pads to fit. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: ladyhawk61

customer_reviews.title: The Good News Is....
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that the velcro strips that hold the mop pad on, fall off after maybe a month. Even more good news, the two circle plastic caps that hold the swivel pole attachment to the head comes out and falls off making the mop useless. I’ve gone through about 10 of these and every single one has the Velcro coming off or some other issue. I really wish that Rubbermaid would fix this product! All of their other products are great.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: We been using around a year good quality worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We been using around a year good quality worth the money
customer_reviews.author: kinfe

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love it! it is easy to mop my floors. just get the pad wet, wring it out, drop on floor, when you touch the mop head to the pool ad, it sticks and you clean your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work doing Housekeeping in a hospital was very impressed with how easy they made mopping so had to buy one for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Shane304

customer_reviews.title: cleaning corners
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaning tool. It is flexible and easy to get under sofa and into corners. I love that the pad is removable and I can simply launder it. I found it to be suitable for large and small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Lett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great just like the ones we use at the hospital
customer_reviews.text: Looks great just like the ones we use at my hospital cant wait to break it in; if only my handle would come on sooner I ordered everything with one day shipping and the handle still hasn't been shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Mike hancho

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. Too narrow. Too short.
customer_reviews.text: The head does not fit the cloth mops. It is smaller all around than my old rubbermaid mop heads. See photos of both. Unable to clean up close to objects with the new mop.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Snaps right on to the Hygen handle to make clean up fast and easy. The Vel-Cro fasteners on the bottom hold the pads securely but release easily for laundering of the pads.
customer_reviews.author: m@Rty b

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Without a Handle
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to order a handle when you buy this because you're only getting the mop head. It works well and is easy to use. Should be sold with handle included so you can use it right out the box.
customer_reviews.author: L.W. Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: Essential for easy and FAST floor dusting/cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Essential for easy and FAST floor dusting/cleaning. Its part of a system; you need the handle and the 'mops' to go with this Rubbermaid Hygen par. A purchase you'll boast about.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: I saw a janitor using one of these mops when my mom was in the hospital. I purchased this for me because my whole downstairs is tile and it works really great and makes mopping my floors fast and easy. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Anne

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: My last one eventually busted and I bought this replacement. Working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning, swivel doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and quick for cleaning our floors, I have never cleaned the floors as much as I do now with this handy tool. Bad thing is the swivel doesn't work on mine, so I'm often kicking it with my foot to get it to go the way I want it.
customer_reviews.author: jill11

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart. The connection between the Pole and the mop head broke
customer_reviews.text: I love how quick and easy it is to use. But the top attachment that goes to the pole keeps coming off. Is falling off a few times now I'm trying to reattach it and it broke!! I have only used it a few times
customer_reviews.author: mom reading

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the heads in different sizes for different jobs. Can switch from a 12" mop to a 60" one using same mop stick
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very happy. Super easy. Mops stay on without moving until you want to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Judd Dare

customer_reviews.title: This is just  the beginning (you have to buy the handle separately)
customer_reviews.text: It seems weird to buy a head without a handle, but this is fine for what I use it for (light floor cleaning). I got the extension mop handle for this. They snap together perfectly and feel solid. I use the HYGEN Microfiber room mop pad with this for my wood floors. It all works out.
customer_reviews.author: Charlemagne 🐇Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Okay but beware additional purchase required.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Works perfectly and makes the job a snap! However, it should state CLEARLY that it uses a proprietary pole. That makes it not such a great value as it DOUBLES the price! The associated pictures show a pole in use and attached to this item. This detail makes this miss a well deserved 5 star rating. FYI - Regular handles won't work, without duct tape... lol ;D
customer_reviews.author: JohnB58

customer_reviews.title: The only mop you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mop I use. I have had it for 8 years and just had to replace the mop head because the Velcro became loose and I was too lazy to glue it back on. Plus, I wanted a fresh, new mop head. I have kids and puppies and this is the only mop that cleans my hardwood floors. It picks up pet hair like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Kyligirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, switches out from a dry mop head to a microfiber head or any of the others that are offered. I like that it is easy enough to rinse off and keep clean. It is just the right size and can get in and under lots of places. It is worth the price. I got it along with the Rubbermaid FGQ76000 48-Inch to 72-Inch expandable handle.
customer_reviews.author: azreads

customer_reviews.title: velcro coming off
customer_reviews.text: i have purchased this product for over 10 years and absolutely love this mop system however within the last year or so the Velcro has been falling off (glue different?) is anyone else experiencing this problem? I’ve had to replace them because of corners getting broken or the snap breaking from usage but never on the Velcro side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not coming with the stick; need to order it separately!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine that this product came without its stick. And because I have to order the stick separately, I will return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Not entire mop
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading on what the product is. I thought i was getting entire setup
customer_reviews.author: krystal mcknight

customer_reviews.title: I like how this head can detach from the handle so ...
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly with the Rubbermaid handle. I like how this head can detach from the handle so I can fit this in my trunk. The base is metal, so you can tell it will be durable for a long time. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: MagicNoseGoblin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Much stronger and better built than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Much stronger and better built than the flimsy ones I normally buy. Really gets the dried dog drool off our hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Loring C. Mercil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is easy to get to any tight spot with it. I use it for cleaning floors and walls. Great quality, durable.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana K.

customer_reviews.title: The Last Mop you will Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is greatness all rolled into one. I watched the cleaning crew at my job work with these. They actually swept and mopped all at the same time and the floors looked good. I wanted one for the house and I love it. It's great on te floors and sweeps and mops all at the same time. I'd I want to scrub a spot I do have to put a bit of work into that spot but it does come up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hunzeker

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight sturdy mop frame
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to attach to handle, sold separately. Smooth and easily maneuverable when used with Hygen wet/dry Velcro pads - sold separately. Effortless cleaning of large areas in house. Durable construction, mops stay put. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: great product for keeping the laminated wood floors clean without warping or water marks
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick and price was good. My wife loves the ease of use and cleaning of the pads. We use to use a sponge mop but too many water marks and it wasn't good for the wood because it was too much water. We simply spray water on the floors from a plastic bottle and wipe it up with the Rubbermaid mop. The floors look a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bethke

customer_reviews.title: new to this system of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: great item that i purchased with the commercial pole. between the two parts i don't have to stoop over (I'm 5'6") and the head is smooth and swivels easily getting under my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Brits

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: Great system! Our house keeping at the ER I work at uses them so I thought I'd try it at home. It is great! Use it dry or wet, with water, cleaner or wax. It does it all! Plus it fits just about anywhere and under everything. Does well on wood, ceramic or stone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy , light weight and easy to use!! Never again will I use a mop!! Perfect gift for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 17" frame is not long enough
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 17" frame thinking that 18" mop will be wide enough, but it barely fits. I can only use one corner because the frame isn't wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: John Avery

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this.
customer_reviews.text: We have all wood floors. My husband saw this at the hospital when he was there for a visit recently. He just had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Clive

customer_reviews.title: Clean Mop
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mop. Moves around amazing, can get under almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Terri F. Steinbar

customer_reviews.title: This makes for a very poor fit and the pad doesn't stay on securely
customer_reviews.text: This frame is actually 17" long instead of 18" and the Rubbermaid pads that are supposed to be 18" long are 21" long. This makes for a very poor fit and the pad doesn't stay on securely, causing it to fold up on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: KB Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Gets the job done quick.
customer_reviews.text: This product is quick, efficient, and very maneuverable. It is super easy to use and clean and I highly recommend this product. I use this not only for floors, but for my walls too. It saves so much time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Curran

customer_reviews.title: Better than swiffer!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for work and decided to buy one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop handle and head. Flop the wrung-out mop on the floor, push the head on it and GO! Finally a handle long enough for my 6 ft. 4 in. frame, so I'm not all bent over. Well worth the money. (Why is everything made so short??)
customer_reviews.author: Texasradio

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Hygen Mop Quick-Connect Frame
product_meta.description: Size:17-InchThe Rubbermaid Commercial Products HYGEN Mop Quick-Connect Wet/Dry Single-Sided Frame features a flat profile that slides easily under furniture and equipment. The Rubbermaid HYGEN microfiber mop features a lightweight aluminum construction for improved productivity. The one-step connecting mechanism speeds the mop parts assembly and changeover. The flat frame profile is sanitary and easy to clean and the replaceable hook-and-loop strips cost efficiently extend product life.
feature_bullets: Connects to Microfiber Mop Heads With a Hook and Loop Fastener That Can Be Replaced When Worn
Features a Nylon Swivel Joint for Flexible Maneuvering
Made of Aluminum With Stainless Steel Fastenings for Corrosion Resistance and Light Weight
Made with non magnetic metals, enabling use near magnetically sensitive equipment, such as MRIs
Measures 17 inches l x 3 inches w x 1 to 1/2 inches h
